import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ template: ``, }) export class OrdersComponent { } @Component({ templateUrl: './order-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.css'] }) export class OrderListComponent { } @Component({ templateUrl: './new-order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.css'] }) export class NewOrderComponent { userForm: any; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.CreateForm(); } CreateForm() { this.userForm = this.formBuilder.group({ 'orderNumber': ['', Validators.required], 'orderDate': ['', [Validators.required]], 'customer': ['', [Validators.required]], 'status': ['', [Validators.required]], 'totalCost': [''], 'products': ['[]'], 'comment': [''] }); } saveOrder(): void { } }
